price: 25. Ceux qui vécurent avant eux avaient aussi crié au mensonge, et le supplice fondit sur eux par où ils ne le sentaient point (venir).
arabic: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim fa-atāhumu al-ʿadhābu min ḥaythu lā yashʿurūna
